reviews: Amazing app but it would be great if you guys could add some features for the bots. Please add more configuration options for the bots. For instance, it would be nice to have a stop limit sell option for the bots to exit all positions once it reaches down to an undesirable price. Also, it would be much better to visualize the chart & current orders simultaneously while looking at the bot stats instead of having to constantly switch the screens back and forth

I love this exchange, on desktop! The app however can be a huge chore to use. For all intents and purpose, when it's working it's the best I've used but often it has issues crashing whenever volume gets crazy which doesn't happen on their desktop version, at least not for me. Edit: the crashing issue is little better, but now whenever I try to hold my finger on a particular bar on a chart to view the OHLC for that candle the info box only pops up for a tiny split second! It's SUPER frustrating!

This app gets worse with every update. Sometimes it's little things like not being able to see details about charts for more than a fraction of a second. Sometimes it's features you rely on like choosing interest rates for loans. Now it logs me out of my account every time I close the program (and runs me through the tutorial every time I sign in), and doesn't save settings. I am becoming suspicious of whether the numbers it feeds me are real.

Good features, lots of supported coins, but sluggish and unstable app. Had an issue with a failed withdrawal, tried the live chat 3 times and each time the chat was ended as soon as I was next in line. So I emailed their support, and it took 3-4 days to get a response, which didn't solve the issue, I responded saying so and haven't heard back in another 2 days. Not a great experience overall.

Not able to complete verification, the app has access to camera and files and when I try to use the camera, it doesn't open it, trying to select a file doesn't work either, changing to another folder with files shows nothing, if I go back to the all media option, all the files are gone and I cannot select or do anything to verify my identity. I already installed it in two phones and nothing seams to work to complete this step.

The exchange is good, but their app sucks. I have lost lots of money, because the app decides I need to enter a password most times I go to buy or sell. By the time you do the password opportunities fly by. The security is losing us more money than saving. Text boxes where you enter amount erase with almost any action. To top it off the button to bid 100% is extremely close to the transfer button. So you enter everything then if you get near the transfer button. It erases and you start over.

I find the app difficult to navigate. There are tons of features but I don't know how to use them. There are some tutorials but I didn't find those useful. Buying and selling is a little cumbersome. I don't trade frequently so I have to reteach myself every time. If you have any technical issues or need support expect significant delays or canned responses. I had one experience where they just kept asking me for screen shots. I was trying to convey that doesn't show the issue. They never fixed.

Solid exchange. They respond in a fairly timely manner to issues but are very seldom able to solve anything so you are pretty much on your own & just have to wait to see if it resolves. I had an incident resolved by their higher level support that went well but slow. The biggest issues are; 1.) Significant language barrier at times. 2.) They have repeatedly been unusable during critical spikes. 3.) The ability to participate in drops is impossible for non-bots & needs to be fixed.

Really love this app. Definitely a little complicated but works really well and support is very good if you ever need it. As well as being 24/7 which is great. What I would love to see added is a menu tab that shows you all your open orders over main/trading/finance/etc so that they could easily be cancelled without having to remember what all you have in orders and where. And a feature to see amounts of each currency currently in a loan. Would make it easier to know how much of x currency held

It took a while to get going. It looks complex but once you get the hang of everything its amazing. My bank didn't allow any transfers for a while but then the financial institution banx stepped in in kucoin and it all went in smoothly. Futures are amazing. You can go long and short. No other app compares. The charts are amazing and very informative. Many crypto available to choose from more than other platforms.

I like the App but it could be better.. needs to add buy in totals and percentage to make the user experience easier. The bots are decent and the Charts are decent as well. It'd be great if they could add a few more coins as well. Adding and REMOVING USD is a pain in the bum and costly to convert but the actual trading fees are extremely reasonable. Overall I would recommend

Terrible app. Locks me out for 24 hours randomly saying I've changed security settings - which I haven't. When I click on main balance, sometimes there's no option to go anywhere else. Back arrow exits the app so I'm forced to open desktop version from my mobile phone. Just full of rookie issues. So annoying when you're under time constraints and have trades to make.

Normally this is a fantastic app. Easy to use and the built in trading bot strategies provide a great passive income opportunity if utilized properly. However I've been unable to login for almost 2 weeks due to a 'NETWORK_TIMEOUT' error at the CAPTCHA. It has been intermittent for months but now it's constant. Followed all troubleshooting steps (cleared cache, etc) but received no reply from anyone at KuCoin on my tickets. Poor communication experience.

"Update Found" window that you can't dismiss recently started popping up, not even as a push notification, but an entire screen overlay, instant uninstall. I understand the need to keep apps updated, especially the security risk involved with an app like this, however this is an absolutely awful and inexcusable design choice.
Imagine opening the app to close a losing trade and then being forced to sit through an ad before you can do so. Garbage app. To be clear, the exchange is excellent. The app is really bad.

AVOID! AVOID! AVOID! Do not download and deposit any money. I've been waiting for over 2 hours after making the transfer for it to show in my Kycoin account. It appears a few other have been having the same issue. Raising a support ticket takes upto 48hours for a response, and from what I've now read, people have been waiting for over a month for thier money to be refunded. Avoid the headache we're all having and use a different crypto app. It's not worth the hassle, I can vouch for that.

Fingerprint doesn't work properly. Every time I login with a fingerprint, it asks to re-authentcate fully with email and 2fa codes. Extremely annoying, takes a lot of time and defeats the point of a fingerprint which is way more secure than typing the password all the time. Please fix it. Android. Pixel 7

Worst app to use for holding or trading purposes it's been 10 days I haven't received my withdrawal it's under review for no reason at the time of deposit they didn't had any problem from which wallet or source the money is coming from but at the time of withdrawal they had a problem with that. Asking me to provide the screenshot of the account that I'm depositing the money in because it has many transactions going on like seriously. Play store should take it down👎 everything is worst .

Terrible company they make you jump through hoops just to get money out but very easy to put money in!! I never forget my passwords but for some reason on this app after a few days my passwords don't work. Every time you want to remove money all your passwords are wrong!! It's a complete scam don't use. Way more hassle than it's worth

MY USDT IS STUCK IN THIS APP. FEELS LIKE A SCAM I sent some money for a trade that was listed on kucoin. Now I have to send my identity verification and wait 1-3 business days before complete. Missed my trade and have to wait to get my money out of there and send it back to my cold wallet. What a waste of time and missinformation. Wth is a trade password?! First and last time using this. I dont recommand.

The crappies customer support in P2P. I have an ongoing appeal opened for 3 weeks. No one is doing anything to solve it. I provided tons of screenshots that transfer has been made. But they are asking for a bank statement in pdf. even tho the seller never complained that he didn't receive a payment. I don't share my private information when there is no need for it.. I'm the one who initiated an appeal because coin was not released to me. So, ask other party for information or release the coin.

They could charge you a 70% fee of the amount transferred to your account. This is without couting the fee that you need to pay for getting the money back to your wallet. I'm definitely done with you guys!
It has a very comfortable, simple interface to use and I have been exposed to a lot of whooping bonuses since Intial deposit ...Great app

Stop install it. I have lost my whole acc because I can't deposit through their fast trade to get more margin, very bad app. Their account deposit is very bad, I have failed more than 30 times retry. I wish I could give negative.

I give u 5 star and is easy user interface..also I recommend to everyone must used it cz is a part of education levels of crypto currency..I like also security level to access information about ur privacy..this app is an opportunity to work with people around the world.😍😍

This is a theiving app. Be careful. Too many scam coins, scam event where you wouldn't be able to received your prizes. Even using trading bots this app will consume a lot of your winnings. Stay away.
The verification is tedious and the transaction fees outrageous. Any simple action just takes forever.... Edit: also there's no option to contact them so good luck, you're on your own...

Terrible company to try to deal with. They have four payment methods and there are issues with them all. Rather than fix the issue, kucoin support told me if I needed to puchase anything I needed to use a different company since kucoin couldn't figure it out.

Please we need some technical settings like in binance. Buy position indicator, order position in chart, Sar, bar information on K-line, alot tht i cant say here. Just something new. I'm tired of same old outlook everytime. I kept doing updates, hoping for something new but nothing

2495467, read the emails and the multiple way I have to explain the same thing for support to still not get it, clearly don't use the product and are far from advanced traders. Total time wasters, different staff every email, repeating the same none relevant information. Went on for about a month....
Not sure what happened but I'm guessing the last update took away advanced features on the futures UI. Frustrating... But still a decent exchange.

The customer service has to be the most useless unhelpful bunch of damn people or maybe they use bots because no one can answer a f##king question they just repeat the same thing. All I wanted to do was delete my account and they needed some information and I asked where to find that at and it just asked the same thing . And of course they don't have a phone number to call so someone can help. Hell I bought Big eyes crypto and someone reached out within a hour. This site is a joke

This is a very terrible app with a terrible support team. I have not been able to log in since they upgraded their app and the team are not doing anything about it. Whenever you go through the verification process, you never get the verification code either by SMS or email. It's just annoying and frustrating. It's more like this team are out here to scam you of your crypto and they move on to the next victims. I DO NOT RECOMMEND

I'm satisfied with the overall UI of the app, one feature I'd really like to have though, is to be able to draw trend lines etc.. on the charts, I make some trades on the go and I have to draw on another app then switch to kucoin. It would be a fun feature to have in my opinion.

Facial recognition for ID verification is totally worthless. I didn't have facial hair in my ID and now I do so it automatically fails me and there's no option to push for manual verification. Also, it constantly says my mouth or nose is covered when they are not. And my beard is trimmed so it's not that either. I'll look for another exchange...

This looks like par for the course of late on these ratings. Absolutely brutal turnaround time for support resolution. I had completed "advanced" KYC in order to have movement of funds. Test withdrawal of 100 USDT and it's been under review since the 19th of May! I received 4 page due diligence document which was invasive but still supplied this and proof of address with added ID four days ago. Stop asking patience and execute!! *** Update, now asking for my bank statements, avoid at all cost!!

You should try and increase the number of price alerts one can set. And also introduce a limit order in the borrowing panel(something like borrow this coin when the price drops to this) more like an automation. Thanks for your soonest response

Not good for futures trading because the chart is not available in Tradingview and the chart that is embedded in the site itself is not appropriate. Also, the UI, UX is not as simple as Binance, bybit,... exchanges. Add usdt to trading units in futures section.

A great crypto trading app. The lack of being able to see what you purchased something for and what you've lost or gained on it is a big downfall. Improve this and it's the best crypto app I've come across

Don't ever use these app , mark my words , ur transaction get stuck in many coins , u can buy easily once u sell it , it will get stuck and it shows its in open order , soo that money doesn't turn into usd ever soo consider that money is gone , and many coins are scam

Overall experience is not bad but some features are not fully implemented. For example, when a user makes an order there is no means to double-check that order is what user intended to be. This feature is very useful and mobile app of Binance provides user with such experience. Also, starting from around several months ago, data of the chart, order book and trade log are not synchronized, especially, when switching between different time periods for the chart and this is a very big flaw.

Great app but every time there is an update it forces you to download through the app instead of the play store. Then i have to wait for that update to show in playstore and update it from there, then it works again. Until then i can't use the app. Can take a few days. Happens quite often, which is very frustrating. I'm not going to allow the app to perform updates, this sounds very unsafe. This has been going on since more than a year.

I've used practically every exchange out there and Kucoin is definitely the best exchange to use. It's so simple and they made it so easy to navigate through. Love it!

Surely my favorite app. So far so good, be nice if fees were less though. I haven't had any issues with the exchange, but I'm not a trader right now, I traded in so much coins, so I can't comment on it as a trading platform for that. The fees do seem pretty high, especially when buying low priced coins. If they could lower the fees it would a lot on those. Being able to set limit orders and track gain or loss would be nice. Gain and loss is even on more smooth. Overall satisfied with that.

Kucoin is great for the currencies they offer, however, they're customer service is extrenely poor. I have been trying to get my trading password changed for nearly two weeks now, which means I can't make any trades until it is fixed. I have provided all of the required security information, but they have been incredibly slow and unhelpful and just keep giving stock standard responses. Very disappointed. Would not recommend.

Be wary using this service. I got scammed out of rewards by their support. Seems like they are running out of resources if they advertise rewards and wont distribute those to qualifying users. You can't really do anything if support team wont even help you, who will you contact? Choose a different service. I will move my funds to a different service as well. I would rate the experience at negative 5 so far.
I really like it. Just as easy and fast to use as binance. Also very powerful with lots of features. Layout is very comfortable. Ux was well thought out.

The latest app update seems to have adversely affected the refresh rate of the incoming data being displayed, for example on the orderbooks and tickers, which used to refresh very fast, one of my favorite parts of Kucoin. I love this exchange and love this app, but would LOVE it if somehow the orderbooks and refresh rates on everything could somehow be a little faster. The latest update seems to have slowed them down a little. This makes it extremely hard to keep adequate track of price action.
